requestBody.title: Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

view.title: Customer one signs up and logs in
view.subtitle: Primary customer account created.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.
